page.title: 14Religion
page.content: The Anglican Church in Stillingfleet draws it's congregation from Kelfield and Stillingfleet with one service each Sunday, held by the Vicar of Escrick. Kelfield Methodist congregation of 8 hold services once a fortnight in the Church at Kelfield, the minister for the Snaith-Selby circuit being based at Sherburn-in-Elmet. The 26 strong Stillingfleet Methodist congregation hold services each Sunday. 15 children,from Stillingfleet, Kelfield and Riccall, attend Sunday School at Stillingfleet. Methodists and Anglicans hold joint services on many occasions. Services are held monthly at the Anglican Church of St John at Acaster Selby. There are places of worship for other religions in Selby,Tadcaster & York.
